Title: Relates to dispensing certain controlled substances for use by a person with a substance use disorder
Summary: Relates to dispensing certain controlled substances for use by a person with a substance use disorder during certain emergency medical treatment, or to relieve acute withdrawal symptoms.
LawCode: Amd ยง3351, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to dispensing certain controlled substances for use by a person with a substance use disorder
